title: Indian chicken curry, fit for a king
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '2 medium onions, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper or to taste', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', '5 tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped', '450g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cubed']
